description: Smartwool's PhD® Snow Light Elite Pattern uses targeted cushioning for maximum protection without the bulk—perfect for your tight-fitting snow boots. With their Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, their Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort, and their 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed, performance-oriented fit, these Merino wool socks help enhance every snow day activity.
name: Smartwool PhD Snow Targeted Cushion Pattern Over the Calf Socks - Mens
